00049 /***************************************************************************/
00060 void EBI_Init(const EBI_Init_TypeDef *ebiInit)
00061 {
00062   uint32_t ctrl = EBI->CTRL;
00063 
00064 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00065   /* Enable Independent Timing for devices that supports it */
00066   ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_ITS;
00067 
00068   /* Set polarity of address ready */
00069   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineARDY, ebiInit->ardyPolarity);
00070   /* Set polarity of address latch enable */
00071   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineALE, ebiInit->alePolarity);
00072   /* Set polarity of write enable */
00073   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineWE, ebiInit->wePolarity);
00074   /* Set polarity of read enable */
00075   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineRE, ebiInit->rePolarity);
00076   /* Set polarity of chip select lines */
00077   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineCS, ebiInit->csPolarity);
00078   /* Set polarity of byte lane line */
00079   EBI_BankPolaritySet(ebiInit->banks, ebiLineBL, ebiInit->blPolarity);
00080 #else
00081   /* Set polarity of address ready */
00082   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineARDY, ebiInit->ardyPolarity);
00083   /* Set polarity of address latch enable */
00084   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineALE, ebiInit->alePolarity);
00085   /* Set polarity of write enable */
00086   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineWE, ebiInit->wePolarity);
00087   /* Set polarity of read enable */
00088   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineRE, ebiInit->rePolarity);
00089   /* Set polarity of chip select lines */
00090   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineCS, ebiInit->csPolarity);
00091 #endif
00092 
00093   /* Configure EBI mode and control settings  */
00094 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00095   if (ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK0)
00096   {
00097     ctrl &= ~(_EBI_CTRL_MODE_MASK
00098               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYEN_MASK
00099               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTODIS_MASK
00100               | _EBI_CTRL_BL_MASK
00101               | _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE_MASK
00102               | _EBI_CTRL_BANK0EN_MASK);
00103     ctrl |= (ebiInit->mode << _EBI_CTRL_MODE_SHIFT);
00104     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyEnable << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYEN_SHIFT);
00105     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyDisableTimeout << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTODIS_SHIFT);
00106     ctrl |= (ebiInit->blEnable << _EBI_CTRL_BL_SHIFT);
00107     ctrl |= (ebiInit->noIdle << _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE_SHIFT);
00108     if ( ebiInit->enable)
00109     {
00110       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK0EN;
00111     }
00112   }
00113   if (ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK1)
00114   {
00115     ctrl &= ~(_EBI_CTRL_BL1_MASK
00116               | _EBI_CTRL_MODE1_MASK
00117               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDY1EN_MASK
00118               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO1DIS_MASK
00119               | _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE1_MASK
00120               | _EBI_CTRL_BANK1EN_MASK);
00121     ctrl |= (ebiInit->mode << _EBI_CTRL_MODE1_SHIFT);
00122     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyEnable << _EBI_CTRL_ARDY1EN_SHIFT);
00123     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyDisableTimeout << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO1DIS_SHIFT);
00124     ctrl |= (ebiInit->blEnable << _EBI_CTRL_BL1_SHIFT);
00125     ctrl |= (ebiInit->noIdle << _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE1_SHIFT);
00126     if ( ebiInit->enable)
00127     {
00128       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK1EN;
00129     }
00130   }
00131   if (ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK2)
00132   {
00133     ctrl &= ~(_EBI_CTRL_BL2_MASK
00134               | _EBI_CTRL_MODE2_MASK
00135               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDY2EN_MASK
00136               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO2DIS_MASK
00137               | _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE2_MASK
00138               | _EBI_CTRL_BANK2EN_MASK);
00139     ctrl |= (ebiInit->mode << _EBI_CTRL_MODE2_SHIFT);
00140     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyEnable << _EBI_CTRL_ARDY2EN_SHIFT);
00141     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyDisableTimeout << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO2DIS_SHIFT);
00142     ctrl |= (ebiInit->blEnable << _EBI_CTRL_BL2_SHIFT);
00143     ctrl |= (ebiInit->noIdle << _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE2_SHIFT);
00144     if ( ebiInit->enable)
00145     {
00146       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK2EN;
00147     }
00148   }
00149   if (ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK3)
00150   {
00151     ctrl &= ~(_EBI_CTRL_BL3_MASK
00152               | _EBI_CTRL_MODE3_MASK
00153               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDY3EN_MASK
00154               | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO3DIS_MASK
00155               | _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE3_MASK
00156               | _EBI_CTRL_BANK3EN_MASK);
00157     ctrl |= (ebiInit->mode << _EBI_CTRL_MODE3_SHIFT);
00158     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyEnable << _EBI_CTRL_ARDY3EN_SHIFT);
00159     ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyDisableTimeout << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTO3DIS_SHIFT);
00160     ctrl |= (ebiInit->blEnable << _EBI_CTRL_BL3_SHIFT);
00161     ctrl |= (ebiInit->noIdle << _EBI_CTRL_NOIDLE3_SHIFT);
00162     if ( ebiInit->enable)
00163     {
00164       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK3EN;
00165     }
00166   }
00167 #else
00168   ctrl &= ~(_EBI_CTRL_MODE_MASK
00169             | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYEN_MASK
00170             | _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTODIS_MASK
00171             | _EBI_CTRL_BANK0EN_MASK
00172             | _EBI_CTRL_BANK1EN_MASK
00173             | _EBI_CTRL_BANK2EN_MASK
00174             | _EBI_CTRL_BANK3EN_MASK);
00175   if ( ebiInit->enable)
00176   {
00177     if ( ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK0 )
00178     {
00179       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK0EN;
00180     }
00181     if ( ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK1 )
00182     {
00183       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK1EN;
00184     }
00185     if ( ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK2 )
00186     {
00187       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK2EN;
00188     }
00189     if ( ebiInit->banks & EBI_BANK3 )
00190     {
00191       ctrl |= EBI_CTRL_BANK3EN;
00192     }
00193   }
00194   ctrl |= ebiInit->mode;
00195   ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyEnable << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYEN_SHIFT);
00196   ctrl |= (ebiInit->ardyDisableTimeout << _EBI_CTRL_ARDYTODIS_SHIFT);
00197 #endif
00198 
00199   /* Configure timing */
00200 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00201   EBI_BankReadTimingSet(ebiInit->banks,
00202                         ebiInit->readSetupCycles,
00203                         ebiInit->readStrobeCycles,
00204                         ebiInit->readHoldCycles);
00205   EBI_BankReadTimingConfig(ebiInit->banks,
00206                            ebiInit->readPageMode,
00207                            ebiInit->readPrefetch,
00208                            ebiInit->readHalfRE);
00209   EBI_BankWriteTimingSet(ebiInit->banks,
00210                          ebiInit->writeSetupCycles,
00211                          ebiInit->writeStrobeCycles,
00212                          ebiInit->writeHoldCycles);
00213   EBI_BankWriteTimingConfig(ebiInit->banks,
00214                             ebiInit->writeBufferDisable,
00215                             ebiInit->writeHalfWE);
00216   EBI_BankAddressTimingSet(ebiInit->banks,
00217                            ebiInit->addrSetupCycles,
00218                            ebiInit->addrHoldCycles);
00219   EBI_BankAddressTimingConfig(ebiInit->banks,
00220                               ebiInit->addrHalfALE);
00221 #else
00222   EBI_ReadTimingSet(ebiInit->readSetupCycles,
00223                     ebiInit->readStrobeCycles,
00224                     ebiInit->readHoldCycles);
00225   EBI_WriteTimingSet(ebiInit->writeSetupCycles,
00226                      ebiInit->writeStrobeCycles,
00227                      ebiInit->writeHoldCycles);
00228   EBI_AddressTimingSet(ebiInit->addrSetupCycles,
00229                        ebiInit->addrHoldCycles);
00230 #endif
00231 
00232   /* Activate new configuration */
00233   EBI->CTRL = ctrl;
00234 
00235   /* Configure Adress Latch Enable */
00236   switch (ebiInit->mode)
00237   {
00238     case ebiModeD16A16ALE:
00239     case ebiModeD8A24ALE:
00240       /* Address Latch Enable */
00241       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_ALEPEN_SHIFT, 1);
00242       break;
00243 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00244     case ebiModeD16:
00245 #endif
00246     case ebiModeD8A8:
00247       /* Make sure Address Latch is disabled */
00248       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_ALEPEN_SHIFT, 0);
00249       break;
00250   }
00251 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00252   /* Limit pin enable */
00253   EBI->ROUTE = (EBI->ROUTE & ~_EBI_ROUTE_ALB_MASK) | ebiInit->aLow;
00254   EBI->ROUTE = (EBI->ROUTE & ~_EBI_ROUTE_APEN_MASK) | ebiInit->aHigh;
00255   /* Location */
00256   EBI->ROUTE = (EBI->ROUTE & ~_EBI_ROUTE_LOCATION_MASK) | ebiInit->location;
00257 
00258   /* Enable EBI BL pin if necessary */
00259   if(ctrl & (_EBI_CTRL_BL_MASK|_EBI_CTRL_BL1_MASK|_EBI_CTRL_BL2_MASK|_EBI_CTRL_BL3_MASK))
00260   {
00261     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_BLPEN_SHIFT, ebiInit->blEnable);
00262   }
00263 #endif
00264   /* Enable EBI pins EBI_WEn and EBI_REn */
00265   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_EBIPEN_SHIFT, 1);
00266 
00267   /* Enable chip select lines */
00268   EBI_ChipSelectEnable(ebiInit->csLines, true);
00269 }

00272 /***************************************************************************/
00276 void EBI_Disable(void)
00277 {
00278   /* Disable pins */
00279   EBI->ROUTE = _EBI_ROUTE_RESETVALUE;
00280   /* Disable banks */
00281   EBI->CTRL = _EBI_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00282 }

00285 /***************************************************************************/
00295 void EBI_BankEnable(uint32_t banks, bool enable)
00296 {
00297   if (banks & EBI_BANK0)
00298   {
00299     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BANK0EN_SHIFT, enable);
00300   }
00301   if (banks & EBI_BANK1)
00302   {
00303     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BANK1EN_SHIFT, enable);
00304   }
00305   if (banks & EBI_BANK2)
00306   {
00307     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BANK2EN_SHIFT, enable);
00308   }
00309   if (banks & EBI_BANK3)
00310   {
00311     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BANK3EN_SHIFT, enable);
00312   }
00313 }

00316 /***************************************************************************/
00326 uint32_t EBI_BankAddress(uint32_t bank)
00327 {
00328 #if defined (_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00329   if(EBI->CTRL & EBI_CTRL_ALTMAP)
00330   {
00331     switch (bank)
00332     {
00333       case EBI_BANK0:
00334         return(EBI_MEM_BASE);
00335 
00336       case EBI_BANK1:
00337         return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x10000000UL);
00338 
00339       case EBI_BANK2:
00340         return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x20000000UL);
00341 
00342       case EBI_BANK3:
00343         return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x30000000UL);
00344 
00345       default:
00346         EFM_ASSERT(0);
00347         break;
00348     }
00349   }
00350 #endif
00351   switch (bank)
00352   {
00353     case EBI_BANK0:
00354       return(EBI_MEM_BASE);
00355 
00356     case EBI_BANK1:
00357       return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x04000000UL);
00358 
00359     case EBI_BANK2:
00360       return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x08000000UL);
00361 
00362     case EBI_BANK3:
00363       return(EBI_MEM_BASE + 0x0C000000UL);
00364 
00365     default:
00366       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00367       break;
00368   }
00369   return 0;
00370 }

00373 /***************************************************************************/
00383 void EBI_ChipSelectEnable(uint32_t cs, bool enable)
00384 {
00385   if (cs & EBI_CS0)
00386   {
00387     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_CS0PEN_SHIFT, enable);
00388   }
00389   if (cs & EBI_CS1)
00390   {
00391     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_CS1PEN_SHIFT, enable);
00392   }
00393   if (cs & EBI_CS2)
00394   {
00395     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_CS2PEN_SHIFT, enable);
00396   }
00397   if (cs & EBI_CS3)
00398   {
00399     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->ROUTE), _EBI_ROUTE_CS3PEN_SHIFT, enable);
00400   }
00401 }

00404 /***************************************************************************/
00414 void EBI_PolaritySet(EBI_Line_TypeDef line, EBI_Polarity_TypeDef polarity)
00415 {
00416   switch (line)
00417   {
00418     case ebiLineARDY:
00419       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_ARDYPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00420       break;
00421     case ebiLineALE:
00422       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_ALEPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00423       break;
00424     case ebiLineWE:
00425       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_WEPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00426       break;
00427     case ebiLineRE:
00428       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_REPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00429       break;
00430     case ebiLineCS:
00431       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_CSPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00432       break;
00433 #if defined (_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00434     case ebiLineBL:
00435       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->POLARITY), _EBI_POLARITY_BLPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00436       break;
00437     case ebiLineTFTVSync:
00438       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_VSYNCPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00439       break;
00440     case ebiLineTFTHSync:
00441       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_HSYNCPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00442       break;
00443     case ebiLineTFTDataEn:
00444       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_DATAENPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00445       break;
00446     case ebiLineTFTDClk:
00447       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_DCLKPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00448       break;
00449     case ebiLineTFTCS:
00450       BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_CSPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
00451       break;
00452 #endif
00453     default:
00454       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00455       break;
00456   }
00457 }

00460 /***************************************************************************/
00474 void EBI_ReadTimingSet(int setupCycles, int strobeCycles, int holdCycles)
00475 {
00476   uint32_t readTiming;
00477 
00478   /* Check that timings are within limits */
00479   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00480   EFM_ASSERT(strobeCycles < 16);
00481   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
00482 
00483   /* Configure timing values */
00484   readTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSETUP_SHIFT)
00485                | (strobeCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSTRB_SHIFT)
00486                | (holdCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDHOLD_SHIFT);
00487 
00488 
00489   EBI->RDTIMING = (EBI->RDTIMING
00490                    & ~(_EBI_RDTIMING_RDSETUP_MASK
00491                        | _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSTRB_MASK
00492                        | _EBI_RDTIMING_RDHOLD_MASK))
00493                   | readTiming;
00494 }
00495 
00496 
00497 /***************************************************************************/
00510 void EBI_WriteTimingSet(int setupCycles, int strobeCycles, int holdCycles)
00511 {
00512   uint32_t writeTiming;
00513 
00514   /* Check that timings are within limits */
00515   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00516   EFM_ASSERT(strobeCycles < 16);
00517   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
00518 
00519   /* Configure timing values */
00520   writeTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSETUP_SHIFT)
00521                 | (strobeCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSTRB_SHIFT)
00522                 | (holdCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRHOLD_SHIFT);
00523 
00524   EBI->WRTIMING = (EBI->WRTIMING
00525                    & ~(_EBI_WRTIMING_WRSETUP_MASK
00526                        | _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSTRB_MASK
00527                        | _EBI_WRTIMING_WRHOLD_MASK))
00528                   | writeTiming;
00529 }
00530 
00531 
00532 /***************************************************************************/
00543 void EBI_AddressTimingSet(int setupCycles, int holdCycles)
00544 {
00545   uint32_t addressLatchTiming;
00546 
00547   /* Check that timing values are within limits */
00548   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00549   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
00550 
00551   /* Configure address latch timing values */
00552   addressLatchTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRSETUP_SHIFT)
00553                        | (holdCycles << _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRHOLD_SHIFT);
00554 
00555   EBI->ADDRTIMING = (EBI->ADDRTIMING
00556                      & ~(_EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRSETUP_MASK
00557                          | _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRHOLD_MASK))
00558                     | addressLatchTiming;
00559 }
00560 
00561 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00562 /***************************************************************************/
00569 void EBI_TFTInit(const EBI_TFTInit_TypeDef *ebiTFTInit)
00570 {
00571   uint32_t ctrl;
00572 
00573   /* Configure base address for frame buffer offset to EBI bank */
00574   EBI_TFTFrameBaseSet(ebiTFTInit->addressOffset);
00575 
00576   /* Configure display size and porch areas */
00577   EBI_TFTSizeSet(ebiTFTInit->hsize,
00578                  ebiTFTInit->vsize);
00579   EBI_TFTHPorchSet(ebiTFTInit->hPorchFront,
00580                    ebiTFTInit->hPorchBack,
00581                    ebiTFTInit->hPulseWidth);
00582   EBI_TFTVPorchSet(ebiTFTInit->vPorchFront,
00583                    ebiTFTInit->vPorchBack,
00584                    ebiTFTInit->vPulseWidth);
00585 
00586   /* Configure timing settings */
00587   EBI_TFTTimingSet(ebiTFTInit->dclkPeriod,
00588                    ebiTFTInit->startPosition,
00589                    ebiTFTInit->setupCycles,
00590                    ebiTFTInit->holdCycles);
00591 
00592   /* Configure line polarity settings */
00593   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineTFTCS, ebiTFTInit->csPolarity);
00594   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineTFTDClk, ebiTFTInit->dclkPolarity);
00595   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineTFTDataEn, ebiTFTInit->dataenPolarity);
00596   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineTFTVSync, ebiTFTInit->vsyncPolarity);
00597   EBI_PolaritySet(ebiLineTFTHSync, ebiTFTInit->hsyncPolarity);
00598 
00599   /* Main control, EBI bank select, mask and blending configuration */
00600   ctrl = (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->bank
00601          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->width
00602          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->colSrc
00603          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->interleave
00604          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->fbTrigger
00605          | (uint32_t)(ebiTFTInit->shiftDClk == true
00606                       ? (1 << _EBI_TFTCTRL_SHIFTDCLKEN_SHIFT) : 0)
00607          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->maskBlend
00608          | (uint32_t)ebiTFTInit->driveMode;
00609 
00610   EBI->TFTCTRL = ctrl;
00611 
00612   /* Enable TFT pins */
00613   if (ebiTFTInit->driveMode != ebiTFTDDModeDisabled)
00614   {
00615     EBI->ROUTE |= EBI_ROUTE_TFTPEN;
00616   }
00617 }
00618

00620 /***************************************************************************/
00629 void EBI_TFTSizeSet(uint32_t horizontal, uint32_t vertical)
00630 {
00631   EFM_ASSERT((horizontal-1) < 1024);
00632   EFM_ASSERT((vertical-1) < 1024);
00633 
00634   EBI->TFTSIZE = ((horizontal-1) << _EBI_TFTSIZE_HSZ_SHIFT)
00635                  | ((vertical-1) << _EBI_TFTSIZE_VSZ_SHIFT);
00636 }
00637 
00638 /***************************************************************************/
00649 void EBI_TFTHPorchSet(int front, int back, int pulseWidth)
00650 {
00651   EFM_ASSERT(front < 256);
00652   EFM_ASSERT(back < 256);
00653   EFM_ASSERT((pulseWidth-1) < 128);
00654 
00655   EBI->TFTHPORCH = (front << _EBI_TFTHPORCH_HFPORCH_SHIFT)
00656                    | (back << _EBI_TFTHPORCH_HBPORCH_SHIFT)
00657                    | ((pulseWidth-1) << _EBI_TFTHPORCH_HSYNC_SHIFT);
00658 }
00659 
00660 
00661 /***************************************************************************/
00672 void EBI_TFTVPorchSet(int front, int back, int pulseWidth)
00673 {
00674   EFM_ASSERT(front < 256);
00675   EFM_ASSERT(back < 256);
00676   EFM_ASSERT((pulseWidth-1) < 128);
00677 
00678   EBI->TFTVPORCH = (front << _EBI_TFTVPORCH_VFPORCH_SHIFT)
00679                    | (back << _EBI_TFTVPORCH_VBPORCH_SHIFT)
00680                    | ((pulseWidth-1) << _EBI_TFTVPORCH_VSYNC_SHIFT);
00681 }
00682 
00683 
00684 /***************************************************************************/
00700 void EBI_TFTTimingSet(int dclkPeriod, int start, int setup, int hold)
00701 {
00702   EFM_ASSERT(dclkPeriod < 2048);
00703   EFM_ASSERT(start < 2048);
00704   EFM_ASSERT(setup < 4);
00705   EFM_ASSERT(hold < 4);
00706 
00707   EBI->TFTTIMING = (dclkPeriod << _EBI_TFTTIMING_DCLKPERIOD_SHIFT)
00708                    | (start << _EBI_TFTTIMING_TFTSTART_SHIFT)
00709                    | (setup << _EBI_TFTTIMING_TFTSETUP_SHIFT)
00710                    | (hold << _EBI_TFTTIMING_TFTHOLD_SHIFT);
00711 }
00712 #endif
00713 
00714 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
00715 /***************************************************************************/
00731 void EBI_BankReadTimingConfig(uint32_t banks, bool pageMode, bool prefetch, bool halfRE)
00732 {
00733  /* Verify only valid banks are used */
00734   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
00735 
00736   /* Configure read operation parameters */
00737   if( banks & EBI_BANK0 )
00738   {
00739     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING, _EBI_RDTIMING_PAGEMODE_SHIFT, pageMode);
00740     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING, _EBI_RDTIMING_PREFETCH_SHIFT, prefetch);
00741     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING, _EBI_RDTIMING_HALFRE_SHIFT, halfRE);
00742   }
00743   if( banks & EBI_BANK1 )
00744   {
00745     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING1, _EBI_RDTIMING_PAGEMODE_SHIFT, pageMode);
00746     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING1, _EBI_RDTIMING_PREFETCH_SHIFT, prefetch);
00747     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING1, _EBI_RDTIMING_HALFRE_SHIFT, halfRE);
00748   }
00749   if( banks & EBI_BANK2 )
00750   {
00751     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING2, _EBI_RDTIMING_PAGEMODE_SHIFT, pageMode);
00752     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING2, _EBI_RDTIMING_PREFETCH_SHIFT, prefetch);
00753     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING2, _EBI_RDTIMING_HALFRE_SHIFT, halfRE);
00754   }
00755   if( banks & EBI_BANK3 )
00756   {
00757     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING3, _EBI_RDTIMING_PAGEMODE_SHIFT, pageMode);
00758     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING3, _EBI_RDTIMING_PREFETCH_SHIFT, prefetch);
00759     BUS_RegBitWrite(&EBI->RDTIMING3, _EBI_RDTIMING_HALFRE_SHIFT, halfRE);
00760   }
00761 }

00763 /***************************************************************************/
00780 void EBI_BankReadTimingSet(uint32_t banks, int setupCycles, int strobeCycles, int holdCycles)
00781 {
00782   uint32_t readTiming;
00783 
00784   /* Verify only valid banks are used */
00785   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
00786 
00787   /* Check that timings are within limits */
00788   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00789   EFM_ASSERT(strobeCycles < 64);
00790   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
00791 
00792   /* Configure timing values */
00793   readTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSETUP_SHIFT)
00794                | (strobeCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSTRB_SHIFT)
00795                | (holdCycles << _EBI_RDTIMING_RDHOLD_SHIFT);
00796 
00797   if (banks & EBI_BANK0)
00798   {
00799     EBI->RDTIMING = (EBI->RDTIMING
00800                      & ~(_EBI_RDTIMING_RDSETUP_MASK
00801                          | _EBI_RDTIMING_RDSTRB_MASK
00802                          | _EBI_RDTIMING_RDHOLD_MASK))
00803                     | readTiming;
00804   }
00805   if (banks & EBI_BANK1)
00806   {
00807     EBI->RDTIMING1 = (EBI->RDTIMING1
00808                       & ~(_EBI_RDTIMING1_RDSETUP_MASK
00809                            | _EBI_RDTIMING1_RDSTRB_MASK
00810                            | _EBI_RDTIMING1_RDHOLD_MASK))
00811                      | readTiming;
00812   }
00813   if (banks & EBI_BANK2)
00814   {
00815     EBI->RDTIMING2 = (EBI->RDTIMING2
00816                       & ~(_EBI_RDTIMING2_RDSETUP_MASK
00817                           | _EBI_RDTIMING2_RDSTRB_MASK
00818                           | _EBI_RDTIMING2_RDHOLD_MASK))
00819                      | readTiming;
00820   }
00821   if (banks & EBI_BANK3)
00822   {
00823     EBI->RDTIMING3 = (EBI->RDTIMING3
00824                       & ~(_EBI_RDTIMING3_RDSETUP_MASK
00825                           | _EBI_RDTIMING3_RDSTRB_MASK
00826                           | _EBI_RDTIMING3_RDHOLD_MASK))
00827                      | readTiming;
00828   }
00829 }

00890 void EBI_BankWriteTimingSet(uint32_t banks, int setupCycles, int strobeCycles, int holdCycles)
00891 {
00892   uint32_t writeTiming;
00893 
00894   /* Verify only valid banks are used */
00895   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
00896 
00897   /* Check that timings are within limits */
00898   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00899   EFM_ASSERT(strobeCycles < 64);
00900   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
00901 
00902   /* Configure timing values */
00903   writeTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSETUP_SHIFT)
00904                 | (strobeCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSTRB_SHIFT)
00905                 | (holdCycles << _EBI_WRTIMING_WRHOLD_SHIFT);

00908   {

00910                      & ~(_EBI_WRTIMING_WRSETUP_MASK
00911                          | _EBI_WRTIMING_WRSTRB_MASK
00912                          | _EBI_WRTIMING_WRHOLD_MASK))
00913                     | writeTiming;
00914   }

00916   {

00918                       & ~(_EBI_WRTIMING1_WRSETUP_MASK

00920                           | _EBI_WRTIMING1_WRHOLD_MASK))
00921                      | writeTiming;
00922   }

00926                       & ~(_EBI_WRTIMING2_WRSETUP_MASK
00927                           | _EBI_WRTIMING2_WRSTRB_MASK
00928                           | _EBI_WRTIMING2_WRHOLD_MASK))
00929                      | writeTiming;

00990 void EBI_BankAddressTimingSet(uint32_t banks, int setupCycles, int holdCycles)
00991 {
00992   uint32_t addressLatchTiming;
00993 
00994   /* Verify only valid banks are used */
00995   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
00996 
00997   /* Check that timing values are within limits */
00998   EFM_ASSERT(setupCycles < 4);
00999   EFM_ASSERT(holdCycles < 4);
01000 
01001   /* Configure address latch timing values */
01002   addressLatchTiming = (setupCycles << _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRSETUP_SHIFT)
01003                        | (holdCycles << _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRHOLD_SHIFT);
01004 
01005   if (banks & EBI_BANK0)
01006   {
01007     EBI->ADDRTIMING = (EBI->ADDRTIMING
01008                        & ~(_EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRSETUP_MASK
01009                            | _EBI_ADDRTIMING_ADDRHOLD_MASK))
01010                       | addressLatchTiming;
01011   }
01012   if (banks & EBI_BANK1)
01013   {
01014     EBI->ADDRTIMING1 = (EBI->ADDRTIMING1
01015                         & ~(_EBI_ADDRTIMING1_ADDRSETUP_MASK
01016                             | _EBI_ADDRTIMING1_ADDRHOLD_MASK))
01017                        | addressLatchTiming;
01018   }
01019   if (banks & EBI_BANK2)
01020   {
01021     EBI->ADDRTIMING2 = (EBI->ADDRTIMING2
01022                         & ~(_EBI_ADDRTIMING2_ADDRSETUP_MASK
01023                             | _EBI_ADDRTIMING2_ADDRHOLD_MASK))
01024                        | addressLatchTiming;
01025   }
01026   if (banks & EBI_BANK3)
01027   {
01028     EBI->ADDRTIMING3 = (EBI->ADDRTIMING3
01029                         & ~(_EBI_ADDRTIMING3_ADDRSETUP_MASK
01030                             | _EBI_ADDRTIMING3_ADDRHOLD_MASK))
01031                        | addressLatchTiming;
01032   }
01033 }

01036 /***************************************************************************/
01050 void EBI_BankPolaritySet(uint32_t banks, EBI_Line_TypeDef line, EBI_Polarity_TypeDef polarity)
01051 {
01052   uint32_t bankSet = 0;
01053   volatile uint32_t *polRegister = 0;
01054 
01055   /* Verify only valid banks are used */
01056   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
01057 
01058   while (banks)
01059   {
01060 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
01061     if (banks & EBI_BANK0)
01062     {
01063       polRegister = &EBI->POLARITY;
01064       bankSet = EBI_BANK0;
01065     }
01066     if (banks & EBI_BANK1)
01067     {
01068       polRegister = &EBI->POLARITY1;
01069       bankSet = EBI_BANK1;
01070     }
01071     if (banks & EBI_BANK2)
01072     {
01073       polRegister = &EBI->POLARITY2;
01074       bankSet = EBI_BANK2;
01075     }
01076     if (banks & EBI_BANK3)
01077     {
01078       polRegister = &EBI->POLARITY3;
01079       bankSet = EBI_BANK3;
01080     }
01081 #else
01082     polRegister = &EBI->POLARITY;
01083     banks       = 0;
01084 #endif
01085 
01086     /* What line to configure */
01087     switch (line)
01088     {
01089       case ebiLineARDY:
01090         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_ARDYPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01091         break;
01092       case ebiLineALE:
01093         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_ALEPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01094         break;
01095       case ebiLineWE:
01096         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_WEPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01097         break;
01098       case ebiLineRE:
01099         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_REPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01100         break;
01101       case ebiLineCS:
01102         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_CSPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01103         break;
01104 #if defined(_EFM32_GIANT_FAMILY) || defined(_EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY)
01105       case ebiLineBL:
01106         BUS_RegBitWrite(polRegister, _EBI_POLARITY_BLPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01107         break;
01108       case ebiLineTFTVSync:
01109         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_VSYNCPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01110         break;
01111       case ebiLineTFTHSync:
01112         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_HSYNCPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01113         break;
01114       case ebiLineTFTDataEn:
01115         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_DATAENPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01116         break;
01117       case ebiLineTFTDClk:
01118         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_DCLKPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01119         break;
01120       case ebiLineTFTCS:
01121         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->TFTPOLARITY), _EBI_TFTPOLARITY_CSPOL_SHIFT, polarity);
01122         break;
01123 #endif
01124       default:
01125         EFM_ASSERT(0);
01126         break;
01127     }
01128     banks = banks & ~bankSet;
01129   }
01130 }
01131

01133 /***************************************************************************/
01144 void EBI_BankByteLaneEnable(uint32_t banks, bool enable)
01145 {
01146   /* Verify only valid banks are used */
01147   EFM_ASSERT((banks & ~(EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3)) == 0);
01148 
01149   /* Configure byte lane support for each selected bank */
01150   if (banks & EBI_BANK0)
01151   {
01152     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BL_SHIFT, enable);
01153   }
01154   if (banks & EBI_BANK1)
01155   {
01156     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BL1_SHIFT, enable);
01157   }
01158   if (banks & EBI_BANK2)
01159   {
01160     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BL2_SHIFT, enable);
01161   }
01162   if (banks & EBI_BANK3)
01163   {
01164     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_BL3_SHIFT, enable);
01165   }
01166 }

01169 /***************************************************************************/
01177 void EBI_AltMapEnable(bool enable)
01178 {
01179   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EBI->CTRL), _EBI_CTRL_ALTMAP_SHIFT, enable);
01180 }
